name: Deep Mother's tentacles rising
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Atmospheric scene: Deep Mother's tentacles rising, clear narrative focal point, atmospheric VFX support, cinematic light shaping, high-fidelity illustration, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, cinematic atmosphere, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid readable signage or paragraphs; use iconography or blank signboards. No embedded words., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Atmospheric illustration of: Deep Mother's tentacles rising.
revised_prompt: Present a detailed, high-fidelity image in a painterly style that's reminiscent of tabletop fantasy games like D&D. The setting is a deep sea adventure with an atmospheric scene, the prime focus is on tentacles emerging from the Deep Mother, invoking a powerful narrative drama. The scene is grounded in medieval-fantasy with no elements of modern technology. The color palette favors teals, deep blues, and sea-greens, with pearl highlights providing a pleasing contrast. The materials and gear appearing are consistent with a nautical fantasy realm and invoke a sense of awe. Elements of subsurface caustics and bioluminescent features add a touch of aquatic fantasy realism. The scene is dramatically lit, creating a cinematic atmosphere. The image should be presented in a specified aspect with ample resolution while avoiding artifacts, any icons present should be meaningful or numbered, there should be no conspicuous modern signage, sci-fi UIs, or anime-inspired elements.
